name: Alex Ramirez
persona: Alex Ramirez is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.80. Alex is moderately conscientious and has a fair amount of confidence in academic abilities, though sometimes struggles with maintaining consistent self-discipline. Despite facing some test anxiety, Alex is motivated to achieve better grades and shows resilience when overcoming academic setbacks. Alex is determined to improve academically and is seeking new strategies to boost performance and manage stress.
